name: Blue Haze
description: Daughter of a Blueberry indica and the original Haze, this slightly sativa-dominant hybrid is a versatile strain. It has a pleasing taste and scent, and its furry dense buds produce full-bodied effects. Blue Haze is a great candidate for the regular consumer’s arsenal as it is appropriate for a broad spectrum of activities and provides the optimal balance between cerebral and physical effects.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Happy, Uplifted, Energetic, Euphoric, Stress, Pain, Lack of Appetite, Headaches, Inflammation, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Paranoid, Dizzy, Anxious
